name: Stick RPG: Sticktastic (Prototype 0.2c)
description:
Do you all remember this wonderful game created by XGen Studios called Stick RPG?

It was one of my favorite childhood games, and it's something that I want to recreate. As of now, the plan is to recreate the game as original as possible, yet with many new changes and upgrades. I'm using Game Maker for this, and I don't know much coding so it's all going to be drag-and-drop (nevermind, there's some coding). I'm interested to see what I can do with this, so we'll see how far I can get.

I am currently in college, so the process of this game is going to be very long and dragged out, and I may not ever finish it, but this is something I want to try. I thought I would post this here mainly for my own documentation purposes.
